articles.title: Patriots Super Bowl LX live updates: Can Pats beat Seahawks to clinch title?
articles.description:
The Patriots are looking to win their seventh Lombardi Trophy on Sunday evening.

The post Patriots Super Bowl LX live updates: Can Pats beat Seahawks to clinch title? appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots aim for seventh Super Bowl title against Seahawks on February 8, 2026.
Victory would solidify New England's status as a football powerhouse.
Local businesses expect increased sales during Super Bowl festivities in Boston.
